events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will start reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for the next phase of our recruitment process.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you throughout the recruitment stages.
Your initial screening went well. We are impressed by your software development skills and relevant experience.
Thank you for responding promptly. We appreciate your enthusiasm and willingness to proceed with the interview stages.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
